name: Haunted Holiday
description:
A small proof-of-concept game I made. An action game where a slot machine drives events and treasure! Made using Godot.

Programming/Design/Supplemental Art: DataBass (https://databass.itch.io/)
Art Pack: "Bit Bonanza" by v3x3d (https://v3x3d.itch.io/)

Objective: Collect 40 coins without running out of health or coins

Controls:
Arrows to move (left stick or d-pad on controller)
WASD or space to throw axes (a-button or right stick on controller)

Matches:
Fruit: 4 coins and a fruit which restores health
Diamond: 8 coins
Skull: Summons ghosts
None: Summons zombies

The slot machine takes 1 coin per spin and every three enemies killed spawns a coin.
Press space to start, press Esc to exit at any time

I strongly recommend using a controller!
